\documentclass[tikz]{standalone}
\usepackage{quiver}
\usepackage{tikz-cd}

\begin{document}

\Huge
% https://q.uiver.app/?
\begin{tikzcd}
	c & {\coprod_{C(c,d)}c} & c \\
	\\
	& d
	\arrow["{\iota_{f_1}}", hook, from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow["{\iota_{f_2}}"', hook', from=1-3, to=1-2]
	\arrow["{f_2}", from=1-3, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{f_1}"', from=1-1, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{\epsilon_d}"{description}, dashed, from=1-2, to=3-2]
\end{tikzcd}

\end{document}
